header.title: Who uses Sttok?
header.description: Sttok is a platform designed for companies, lawyers, and startups looking for a comprehensive solution for company management.

items.title: Companies and Corporations
items.content: Digital management of companies. Updated shareholder register. Automatic document generation. Save time and avoid errors.

items.title: Lawyers
items.content: For lawyers managing Companies and Boards. Professional service without errors. Save time without outdated Excel sheets.

items.title: Startups
items.content: For startups and investors. Details of partners and shares. Plan rounds and expansions. Manage employee incentives.
